TopicTitle: Show off your Kerbal Space Presents.

Articles.Content:
Finally have a KSP T-Shirt.

Jebediah Kerman on IVA: Grandma W, Christmas 2014.

A Spore Creature, called "Creater" by my younger self: Parents, Birthday 2010.

Kerbal on EVA (called Gregoly Kerman): Grandma W, Christmas 2013.

All sandstone. The Creater was from the early days of public 3D Printing services, too. Before shapeways. Spore had a service with a 3D printing company where you could insert a .png file (the spore .pngs encoded the creature's information), and they would 3D print and send you the creature. Pretty awesome for that time.

Oddly enough, Jebediah is shinier. Probably will wear off, I bet the EVA Kerb was shiny too way back last year.
I wanted a kerbal on EVA as a Christmas gift, but I wouldn't be able to get it until the 30th
I got this...even though I don't drink coffee, but whatever! KSP everything!
WHY are there not bobble-head dolls yet? I wouldn't mind a subtle winter hat either ( little something with just the logo perhaps )

Don't have pictures of the presents themselves, which have already taken up residence in my office, but I got the "I Brake for Lithospheres" bumper sticker (now on my whiteboard) the KSP logo coffee mug. Very nice!

I got this...even though I don't drink coffee, but whatever! KSP everything!

http://i3.cpcache.com/product/853547906/3_kerbal_logo_mug.jpg?side=b&color=White&height=350&width=350

That's cool! Sadly I dint get any ksp presents
My GF made this for me (for my birthday)
